vitals.description: The ou:vitals snapshot this stake is part of.

orgname.description: The org name as reported by the source of the vitals.

orgfqdn.description: The org FQDN as reported by the source of the vitals.

name.description: An arbitrary name for this stake. Can be non-contact like "pool".

asof.description: The time the stake is being measured. Likely as part of an ou:vitals.

shares.description: The number of shares represented by the stake.

invested.description: The amount of money invested in the cap table iteration.

value.description: The monetary value of the stake.

percent.description: The percentage ownership represented by this stake.

owner.description: Contact information of the owner of the stake.

purchase.description: The purchase event for the stake.
